Conveniently located by Admiralty MRT, our newest store is now serving freshly brewed coffee and tasty treats. 

Address: Blk 676 Woodlands Drive 71, Kampung Admiralty #01-02, Singapore 730676
Tel: 6920 6063

Brewing hours: 
Daily: 0730 – 2300hrs

comments.message: Hey there, it has been more than 2 months since I registered for my gold starbucks card. However, I have yet to receive it. May I know where can I check for the status of it. Thanks!
What are the studying hours?

Hi there, I would like to share my Starbucks experience @ Kampong Admiralty this evening. I was there a little after 5pm with my husband & son. I proceeded to order & asked for a small cup so i could share my drink with my son. After payment, I enquired with the staff at the Counter, Haz, how i could go about reporting the loss of my Starbucks Card. She explained the procedure to me clearly. I then proceeded to sit with my family & have our desserts & drinks. I was scooping some of my drink into the little cup when Haz came over & asked if she could get my son a baby chino. I told her that would be very nice & she said she'd be right back. At that moment, my very impatient son kept asking me to scoop some of my drink for him. Haz told him gently to "Let Mummy relax & enjoy her drink. I'll come back with something for you."
I was touched by her words of kindness & I teared. You see, i had lost my wallet with money, my id & cards & i was feeling so so lost & sad. Being a mum can be overwhelming at times too. Haz & her kindness really brightened up my day. She even gave my son & myself a hug when we went to thank her. In fact, the whole team at Kampong Admiralty deserve recognition for their service. Nicholas (if i remembered his name correctly) also indulged my 4 year old when he wanted his name written on his small paper cup. To team Kampong Admiralty, I thank you Sincerely. May all of u be blessed with all good things always!

Please give them the due recognition they deserve!
